description: Try our easy to follow Chipolata Hot Dogs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chipolata Hot Dogs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut each sheet of puff pastry into 16 squares measuring 6cm each. Wrap one chipolata in each piece of pastry to enclose, pressing two of the corners together to seal. Arrange on the prepared baking trays. Brush pastry with egg and bake for 20 to 25 minutes or until puffed and golden. Serve warm.
